nodes.bodyText: AutoML Beta samples have become flaky before BOM update. I think we should increase default timeout values on client library.

Mike - the issue isn't the need, I'm totally happy w/ that. It's using the same builder twice in a recursive manor that I'm questioning.  What you are doing is probably ok, I'm just asking for another opinion.
I would agree that this looks wrong, but this is the example in the docs https://googleapis.dev/java/google-cloud-automl/latest/com/google/cloud/automl/v1beta1/AutoMlSettings.html

The common on L40 is probably better being right next to L56.
I agree with Les that it look funky, but it is how it's described in the javadocs so probably an issue to raise with the library. (Although according to this you don't need to call the .build()).
